36.AgentMessage2:
Baseball Lifestyle: Thank you for the screenshot, and I'm sorry for any inconvenience. I just checked, and it looks like the item you're trying to buy already has a discount applied. That's likely why the code isn't working, as our system can't stack multiple promos at checkout. Additionally, if you've signed up for text or email alerts before, our system is set up to give the same promo you previously received, so it won't work this time. I hope this helps.

No worries, our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

38.AgentMessage2: Dermstore: You're welcome! The RevitaLash is a conditioner, not a growth serum. It's designed to improve the appearance of lashes by making them look healthier, shinier, and less brittle. Your understanding is greatly appreciated.

escalate: When ESC on weekends, use WKD shortcut
Donâ€™t send to CS for this brand, unless instructed by a template
If cx follows up after not receiving a response to an escalation after to 2 days, re-ESC the convo
ESC immediately if cx haven't received a confirmation email
ESC immediately all order tracking-related/order delay inquiries
ESC even if cx doesn't provide an image needed for escalation
ESC if cx want to speak to a representative & need additional assistance after using the PS shortcut
ESC all snug attachment & snug safety related inquiries
ESC if cx say they've emailed & haven't heard back
ESC inquiries about their TikTok order or store
ESC if cx asks for other options or raises issues about the return policy, or if they flag anything pain-related
ESC any discount errors or codes that do not work
ESC all inquiries about wearing Tushbaby while pregnant
tone: Let the cx have the last word
Don't say "The code can ONLY be added" or similar, say " The code applies when you buy.."
Don't mention that your system is limited
Don't tell cx to stay subscribed to our newsletter or check our website for updates, let them know that as a text subscribers they'll be the first to know about upcoming deals
Don't send long responses for order status inquiries, provide the order details instead if it's available
templates: Totebabys won't be restocked, use TBR shortcut
For inquiries about the tweed-style Tushbaby, pink Tushbaby, the snow leopard Tushbaby or new prints, use the "Tushbaby" temps
For inquiries if the TushBaby can be used for children with special needs OR if we provide a discount for them, use SND shortcut
If the cx asks for the price, use PRC shortcut
If cx says Tushbaby is out of their budget, use OMB shortcut, and don't comment on their financial situation or our prices
dos_and_donts: Don't ask the cx if there is anything else you can assist with, after a convo has been ESC
drive_to_purchase: Don't D2P when a cx just purchased
promo_and_exclusions: All sales/promotions end at midnight PST
If a cx reaches out regarding a sale, do not refer them to the website
TikTok codes are tiktok-specific and can't be used on the website
Discount codes work on sale items, but not on bundles
Offers are not stackable at checkout
